comment.author: 59362370@N05
comment._content: This might be Kawimbe Mission some 12 mile to the East of Mbala, in the Northern Province of Zambia. Otherwise it is perhaps The London Missionary Society Mission ay Old Fife off the  Mbala -Tunduma Road?

comment.author: 78002210@N06
comment._content: I have a memory of this.  If the trees are in the foreground are fig trees then I think it is almost certainly Kawimbe.
